title: 3 and Out - Niners OBJ Debut Blowout, Mahomes Break Out, Russ/Seattle Next Move, Week 10 Recap, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Niners OBJ Debut Blowout, Mahomes Break Out, Russ/Seattle Next Move, Week 10 Recap, Mailbag
description:
John looks at the Niners rolling the Rams on MNF in OBJ's uneventful debut, and why he's worried the Rams are losing their offensive identity. He also breaks down Patrick Mahomes huge break out performance against the Raiders, why Russell Wilson's time in Seattle might be winding down, recaps some top storylines from week 10 and answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Subscribe NOW and follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates! Check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
